data.title: Songwriters Association
data.meta_description: These are Public Radio Stations willing to play music from Independent Artists. Please make sure your MP3s are labeled (metatagged) correctly or it will be
data.text:
These are Public Radio Stations willing to play music from Independent Artists. Please make sure your MP3s are labeled (metatagged) correctly or it will be rejected. Please email any changes to us at support@issasongwriters.com

RADIO STATIONS AND SHOWS THAT ARE WILLING TO PLAY INDEPENDENT MUSIC

“Following a DJ’s set list is mandatory. I find it annoying when someone contacts me asking if I have received their CD, when I have already played them once or twice. It shows me that they would rather bother me than do the work to find out themselves.”

– Angela Page, Host of Folk Plus on WJFF Radio

These are stations and shows that play a variety of genres

College Stations usually have shows covering the entire music spectrum. Public Radio stations tend to have a more “Roots” oriented format such as Blues, Folk, Bluegrass, World, Reggae etc.

(Click on the link to download and print for easy reference)
